summary: Strategy B (temporal saturation) combined with Strategy C (multi-family) cannot achieve sorry-free truth lemma due to fundamental circularity in temporal saturation - omega-rule limitation is architectural, not constructional. Recommended: implement C for modal, accept temporal as documented axioms.

artifacts.summary: Deep analysis of Strategy B+C combination showing temporal saturation faces fundamental circularity that multi-family construction cannot address

metadata.research_focus: Strategy B + C viability for sorry-free truth lemma
metadata.key_finding: Temporal sorries from omega-rule, modal sorry from single-family - different root causes requiring different solutions
metadata.recommendation: Accept temporal sorries as axioms (completeness uses forward only), implement multi-family for modal
